text.quote: 000: Clause 24, page 11, line 38, at end insert “but may only do so with the consent of the trustees”
000: Clause 26, page 13, line 38, leave out “person or” and insert “panel of”
000: Clause 26, page 13, line 40, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: (a) representatives of the party or parties in opposition at the time;
(c) representatives of cross-bench members of the House of Lords.
text.quote: ( ) The panel shall take evidence by way of evidence sessions to be held in public, and shall have power to determine its own terms of reference for evidence taking, which may include matters such as disparities in lifespan and healthy life expectancy between sectors of the population.”
000: After Clause 31, insert the following new Clause—
(1) The Secretary of State must undertake a review of the impact of Part 4 of this Bill on bereaved families, assessing the impact on married and unmarried parents.
(2) The Secretary of State must lay before Parliament a report of the review prepared under this section within six months of this Act receiving Royal Assent.”
